    #include<stdio.h>   /*  RaHuL  */
    #include<iostream>
    #include<algorithm>
    using namespace std;
    inline int scan()
{
int t=0;
char c;
c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c<'0' || c>'9')
c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c>='0' && c<='9')
{
t=(t<<3)+(t<<1)+c-'0';
c=getchar_unlocked();
}
return(t);
}
inline void print(int a)
{
char num[20];
int i=0;
do
{
num[i++]=a%10+48;
a=a/10;
}while(a!=0);
i=i-1;
while(i>=0)
putchar_unlocked(num[i--]);
putchar_unlocked('\n');
}

     
    int main()
    { int t,p,n,x,y,i;
    t=scan();
    while(t--)
    { p=0;
    n=scan();x=scan();y=scan();
    int a[n],b[n];
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    scanf("%d%d",&a[i],&b[i]);
    sort(a,a+n);
    sort(b,b+n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
    if(a[i]==b[i])
    continue;
    else if(b[i]>a[i])
    p+=(b[i]-a[i])*x;
    else
    p+=(a[i]-b[i])*y;
    }
    print(p);
    }
    return 0;
    }
